register.description: PID Register

bitfield.description: Used to distinguish between old scheme and current. Spare bit to encode future schemes. Fixed to be "01"(b)
Function indicates an S/W compatible module family. If there is not level of S/W compatibility, a new Func number (and hence PID) should be assigned
Indicates RTL version

Local revision number which should be owned by module designer. This number should be updated for each major design change (such as bug fix, and memory size change etcÂ…). In present design, fixed to be 0
Indicates a special version for a particular device. Consequence of use may avoid use of standard chip support library (CSL). In this module, fixed to be 0.
Local revision number which should be owned by module designer. This number should be updated for each small design change. In present design, fixed to be 0.

register.description: Control Register

bitfield.description: Storage format of source artificial bitmap image data in SDRAM 0: field storage format 1: frame storage format
Storage format of source data in SDRAM 0: field storage format 1: frame storage format
Storage format of result data in SDRAM 0: field storage format 1: frame storage format
Processing method of each picture data 0: interlaced format (processing based on field format). 1: progressive format (processing based on frame format).
256-step blender function (BLD) activation control register 0 : 256-step BLD is not activated. 1: 256-step BLD is activated.
Chrominance format conversion (CCV) activation control register 0 :CCV is not activated. 1:CCV is activated.
Range mapping function (RGMP: for VC-1 advanced profile) activation control register 0: RGMP is not activated 1: RGMP is activated
Resize function (RSZ) activation control register 0: RSZ is not activated 1: RSZ is activated
This bit defines "enable" or "disable" of image processing for top-field on GE module 0: top-field processing disable 1: top-field processing enable.
This bit defines "enable" or "disable" of image processing for bottom-field on GE module 0: bottom-field processing disable 1: bottom-field processing enable.
Performance mode register 00: Edge Padding 01: Trans-code mode (reference to reference) 10: Pre-Codec mode (video input to reference) 11: Post-Codec mode (video output to reference)
The Graphic Engine processes chrominance data of the targeted frame 0:Chrominance processing disable 1:Chrominance processing enable
The Graphic Engine processes luminance data of the targeted frame 0:Luminance processing disable 1:Luminance processing enable
GE Module status register 0: GE module is in idle 1:GE module is busy

register.description: Interrupt enable control register

bitfield.description: This bit controls preparation to activate interrupt from this module to ARM processor 0: Interrupt disable. 1: Interrupt enable.

register.description: Interrupt assertion function activation register to ARM

bitfield.description: Interrupt assertion function activation register to ARM 0: Interrupt inactivated (cannot write 0). 1: Interrupt activated.

register.description: Interrupt enable clear register

bitfield.description: Interrupt enable clear register 0: No change. 1: Interrupt inactivated (cannot be read by ARM).

register.description: Interrupt status register

bitfield.description: Interrupt status register 0: Configured one frame processing is under way. 1: Configured one frame processing is finished, and not checked yet.

bitenum.description: Configured one frame processing is under way.
Configured one frame processing is finished, and not checked yet.

register.description: Interrupt status clear register

bitfield.description: Interrupt status clear register bit 0: No change. 1: ge_status clear register (write only: cannot be read)

register.description: Emulation control register

bitfield.description: This bit defines whether or not a soft or hard stop is initiated whenever the "emususp" is asserted. 0: Hard stop 1: soft stop

This bit controls whether or not the peripheral will respond to the emulation suspend signal that it has been programmed to monitor. 0: functions based on configuration of "ge_emulsusp_soft". 1: ignores any emulation suspend signal (non-stop).

register.description: SDRAM data storage format register

bitfield.description: SDRAM data storage format for result of the GE module 0: raster scanning mode 1: sub-picture mode
SDRAM data storage format for source data used in GE module 0: raster scanning mode 1: sub-picture mode

register.description: Request unit size for DMA data transfer from/to SDRAM

bitfield.description: This register defines request unit size for DMA data transfer from/to SDRAM "000100000": 32[byte] "001000000": 64[byte] "010000000": 128[byte] "100000000": 256[byte]

register.description: Processing unit size to be generated in Horizontal direction

bitfield.description: This register defines Processing unit size to be generated in Horizontal direction "00001": 16[byte] "00010": 32[byte] "00100": 64[byte] "01000": 128[byte] "10000": 256[byte]

register.description: Start address of source picture area which is prepared for luminance data in top field on SDRAM

bitfield.description: Start address of source picture area which is prepared for luminance data in top field on SDRAM

bitfield.description: Horizontal sub-picture size for top-field luminance data which is stored in SDRAM as source data 000010000: 16[pixel] 000100000: 32[pixel] 001000000: 64[pixel] 010000000: 128[pixel] 100000000: 256[pixel]

register.description: Resize mode register

bitfield.description: Vertical anti-alias filter control bit 0: vertical anti-alias filter is inactive. 1: vertical anti-alias filter is active.
Anti-alias filter mode control bit 0: automatic calculated value for weight coefficient. 1: manual input for weight coefficient.

bitenum.description: automatic calculated value for weight coefficient

bitfield.description: Horizontal and vertical anti-alias filter control bit 0: anti-alias filter inactive. 1: anti-alias filter active
Vertical resize functional type selection bit 0: 4-tap cubic convolution. 1: 4-tap linear interpolation.
Vertical resize functional control bit 0: vertical resize disable 1: vertical resize enable
Horizontal resize functional type selection bit 0: 4-tap cubic convolution. 1: 4-tap linear interpolation.
Horizontal resize functional control bit 0: Horizontal resize disable 1: Horizontal resize enable

register.description: Resize magnification ratio for horizontal direction register

bitfield.description: Resize magnification ratio for horizontal direction

register.description: Resize magnification ratio for vertical direction register

bitfield.description: Resize magnification ratio for vertical direction register

register.description: Horizontal Phase displacement of first resized output pixel position from first pixel in source image

bitfield.description: Horizontal Phase displacement of first resized output pixel position from first pixel in source image

register.description: Vertical Phase displacement of first resized output pixel position from first pixel in source image

bitfield.description: Vertical Phase displacement of first resized output pixel position from first pixel in source image

register.description: Intensity of horizontal anti-aliasing filter

bitfield.description: Intensity of horizontal anti-aliasing filter

register.description: CCV mode register

bitfield.description: Horizontal chrominance conversion functional type selection bit 0 :4-tap cubic convolution. 1:4-tap linear interpolation
Vertical chrominance conversion functional type selection bit 0 :4-tap cubic convolution. 1:4-tap linear interpolation
Mode control for chrominance conversion of source data 0:chrominance conversion on MPEG-2/MPEG-4/H.264/VC-1 1:chrominance conversion on MPEG-1
Mode control for chrominance conversion of result data 0:chrominance conversion on MPEG-2/MPEG-4/H.264/VC-1 1:chrominance conversion on MPEG-1

register.description: 256-Step Blender Control LUT register 0

bitfield.description: Blend factor for color defined in index value "00(b)".
Luminance data for color defined in index value "00(b)".
Chrominance (Cb) data for color defined in index value "00(b)".
Chrominance (Cr) data for color defined in index value "00(b)".

bitfield.description: Blend factor for color defined in index value "01(b)".
Luminance data for color defined in index value "01(b)".
Chrominance (Cb) data for color defined in index value "01(b)".

register.description: Range mapping control register

bitfield.description: Control bit for range mapping on chrominance 0: chrominance range mapping disable. 1: chrominance range mapping enable
Coefficient for multiplier of equation to calculate chrominance pixel value for range mapping
Control bit for range mapping on luminance 0: luminance range mapping disable. 1: luminance range mapping enable
Coefficient for multiplier of equation to calculate luminance pixel value for range mapping

register.description: Extension width of edge padding function for luminance field data in SDRAM

bitfield.description: Vertical extension width of edge padding function for luminance field data in SDRAM
Horizontal extension width of edge padding function for luminance field data in SDRAM
